ResearchProjectDef.label: spark of knowledge
ResearchProjectDef.description: The start of a glorious journey through the ages. The key to unlocking the future, formed from one errant thought.

ResearchProjectDef.label: spark of curiosity
ResearchProjectDef.description: A good foundation has been set, and large strides have been made, such that most natural predators cannot threaten you on their own. But while these primitive tools are good, they simply are not good enough. Why be satisfied with mere wood, when there is a bounty of stone and metal to exploit instead?

ResearchProjectDef.label: spark of innovation
ResearchProjectDef.description: The bounty of the earth itself has been worked to your favor. Leaps and bounds of progress has been made for crafting and forging. However, the human mind and body can only go so far on its own. It is time to develop more advanced tools to assist with both production and data gathering.

ResearchProjectDef.label: spark of wonder
ResearchProjectDef.description: Harnessing the power of electricity has opened numerous horizons for development. But mere earthly ambitions are no longer enough. The stars themselves are now within reach. All you have to do is seize the opportunity.

ResearchProjectDef.label: spark of ingenuity
ResearchProjectDef.description: Further and further your ambition grows. Extraordinary technologies from various sources are now at your fingertips, including the secrets to space flight. But it's not enough. The secrets of the universe must be laid bare before you. Advanced bionics, exotic structures, perhaps even the inner workings of hulking mechanoids. Every morsel of information is fair game.

ResearchProjectDef.label: spark of ascension
ResearchProjectDef.description: Can one know the unknowable? Of course, the answer sounds obvious for an ordinary individual, but you are anything but ordinary.

ResearchProjectDef.label: basic structures
ResearchProjectDef.description: Enough of working while exposed to the elements. Why not indulge in some of the basics of construction: simple walls and doors. They aren't exactly made to last, but they will protect you from the elements well enough.

ResearchProjectDef.label: basic flooring
ResearchProjectDef.description: A roof over your head and walls keeping the outdoors out is all well and good, but there is still one side of a room unaccounted for: the floor. Instead of having filth crunching underneath you all the time, one can simply lay down some wooden planks to not only liven up the place, but also keep your base hygienic.

ResearchProjectDef.label: bridges
ResearchProjectDef.description: Unfortunately, certain terrain isn't stable enough for regular flooring. However, simply placing some supports in the ground allows for light flooring to be laid on such unstable areas, though it is a fair bit more expensive.

ResearchProjectDef.label: firemaking
ResearchProjectDef.description: A cornerstone of technological advancement. Fire has a multitude of uses even for an unadvanced society, from safely preparing food to being used to inflict grievous wounds.

ResearchProjectDef.label: basic crafting
ResearchProjectDef.description: While hands are a quite versatile tool, they can only go so far when it comes to more complex tasks. It would be far more effective to use those hands for creating tools that make working and killing easier.

ResearchProjectDef.label: primitive butchering
ResearchProjectDef.description: While eating raw corpses directly is... barely serviceable, it is highly nutrient inefficient and quite an unpleasant experience. It is far better to hew flesh from bone and properly butcher meat into separate chunks to either consume or prepare.

ResearchProjectDef.label: butchering
ResearchProjectDef.description: While properly butchering meat is a vast improvement over just eating a corpse directly, the process can still be refined. Simply pulling bodies apart with bare hands is both a tough and inefficient process. Creating a dedicated workbench equipped with proper tools is far better for harvesting as much meat as possible.
